oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Abu Ja'far Muhammad b. Ya'qub al-Kulayni (Shi'ite; d. 941)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hadith
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The page is shabby and torn. Only a few lines were left. Taken from al-Kulayni's al-Kafi, the tradition there refers to the first night of the month Ramadan, in which Ibrahim's suhuf were revealed, and the sixth night of the same month, in which the Torah (Pentateuch) was revealed.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Al-Kulayni's Kitab al-Kafi
